column5: With all of this talk of low water levels in NW Ontario how will that affect the pike and walleye fishing? Any ideas on changing of tactics for early season fishing?Duffy
I plan to remove about 30 yards of line from each of my poles. That way I will be fishing shallower and should catch the fish that are shallower while the water is low. I am kidding of course. LOL
That's a really neat website! Thanks
I wouldn't worry about it......I'd much rather be fishing low level water or water on the rise.
